lines: They walk inside.  Guitars everywhere.  Guitars cover the walls, the floor, etc.  The shop is immediately abuzz.  Aldous Snow, famous rocker, has walked inside.  PHIL, the store’s owner, comes up to them.
Aldous Snow.  It’s good to see you stateside.  I thought you’d died.
Phil hands an electric Stratocaster to Aldous.
I just want you to know that Aldous feels terrible about what he’s done.
Does it look like I give a shit?  He just destroyed easily a hundred grand worth of equipment.  I should punch you in the face.
Aldous rolls up the window.  Aaron pulls Phil behind the limo out of Aldous’s sight.
That guy’s a dick, he’s always been a dick.
Because I can’t do it to him.
When you’re done settling up, you want to grab some nosh over at the Russian Tea Room?
I’m a little busy today, Aldous, but thanks for the invite.
Aldous goes back into the limo.  Aaron SUCKER punches Phil.  Phil punches Aaron back.  Aaron kicks Phil hard.  Phil starts punching Aaron.
You!  Will!  Pay!  For!  My!  Guitars!  Now!
Aaron and Aldous are in the backseat.  Aaron is breathing hard and covered in sweat, but trying to cover.  Phil stands up.  Aldous rolls down the window.
Great seeing you, Aldous.  And nice meeting you, Aaron.
